item.description:
Buywithme.com has a deal on the ferry tickets. It's a fast ferry, so we'll reach there in half the time!

http://www.buywithme.com/boston/deals/6741-hy-line-cruises

I talked to the ferry line and they advised to make a reservation beforehand. After you have your coupon, simply call them to make a reservation for May21st, 9:30am going out and 4:25pm coming back.

 

Directions to Hyannis:

http://maps.google.com/maps?f=d&source=s_d&saddr=75+Middlesex+Turnpike,+Burlington,+MA+01803+(Burlington+Mall)&daddr=220+Ocean+Street,+Hyannis&hl=en&geocode=FQY6iAIdvlnB-yH2vHCP4ekESA...
item.why:
Let's plan a trip to Martha's Vineyard on a Saturday morning. We can rent a jeep there for exploring or rent bikes if we want to stay near the harbor.
We can all meet at Burlington mall for carpool
Let me know if anyone is up for it!
item.name: Trip to Martha's Vineyard
